description: The design and production of lighting and sound in theater, dance, music, and general presentation work plays a significant role in the experience of these events. This course introduces the production problems of lighting and sound and includes design projects in both lighting and sound. Open to majors and non-majors. Offered annually in the fall semester. Also counts toward musical theater concentration. Prerequisite: THEAT 140 is recommended.
name: Lighting & Sound
title: Lighting and Sound-Design and Production
